name: Hanoi Cooking Class Tour Haft Day
description: Vietnamese cuisine is going to be one of the world's most delicious for its lively, fresh flavor and artfully composed meals. If you are the tourists in Hanoi who fall in love with foods, cooking class is a golden opportunity to learn how to cook delicious Vietnamese food and you can try your favorite recipe when coming back your homeland. On other hand, cooking class is another great activity to make your trip perfect, beside sightseeing schedules. Let's start the cooking class with us at Hanoi cooking central.
